text:
Being pregnant is no easy task – especially if it's Kim Kardashian West's baby you're carrying.

RadarOnline.com exclusively viewed the contract signed by Kardashian's surrogate – and it reveals an entire list of insanely bizarre demands Kardashian put in place that governed what the carrier of her baby could and could not do, wear and eat!

As RadarOnline.com exclusively reported, Kim and her "Famous" rapper husband Kanye West paid their surrogate a mere $68K for carrying and delivering their baby girl.
title: No Cheese & Strict Portions! The Insane Demands Kim Kardashian Gave Her Surrogate

meta_data.description: The contract states the surrogate was allowed "no more than 6 ounces" of tuna per week!
